Your Career

Become a part of the team and be a visionary

Enjoy the startup atmosphere

Why you should join the team

We are a young and innovative technology startup in the field of digitalization based in Karlsruhe. Our vision is to make digitization cost-effective and with the least possible effort for every company.

You can support us in building the future? Then get in touch with us!

  • Highly motivated startup atmosphere
  • Actively shape the company
  • Direct impact on our product & service
  • Constantly learning
  • Home office & Flexitime
  • Agile team & Flat organisation structure
Are you a visionary with drive?

We want you
